content: **crochet drops christmas bell in cotton viscose or safran and glitter ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops extra 0-513 height approx 6 cm \ 2 3/8 without handle materials drops cotton viscose from garnstudio 50 g color no 05 red 50 g color no 04 mustard or use drops safran from garnstudio 50 g colour no 19 red 50 g colour no 11 strong yellow and use drops glitter from garnstudio 2 spools color no 03 copper 2 spools color no 08 red *yardage does not include glitter as it is a thread * drops crochet hook size 3 mm \ c small jingle bells 1 per crochet bell crochet with 1 thread cotton viscose + 2 threads glitter of each color = 5 threads uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3911&cid=19
